name: Sigils
description:
:-: Greetings, adventurer!


In this chapter, "The Power of Dragons," you'll be introduced to the abilities of a Dragon Druid, and set off on a journey that will test your strength, courage, and cunning, using your druidic dragon powers and sigils.

:-: Key gameplay

  • Use physical motion to generate magic energy by punching spells, or slashing multiple enemies in your dragon form. (VR)

  • Collect dragon eggs to obtain the power of the guardian’s and gain strength, stamina and endurance from crystals.

  • Make the right tactical choices to balance your mana and energy levels, using your bow, magic and motion, combined with sigil and guardian cooldowns.

  • Fight your way through 4 difficulty levels to master the Dragon Druid’s abilities and become the ultimate protector of Gaia.

Strap on your armor, grab your controllers, and prepare to embark on an adventure. The time has come to unleash the dragon within!

:-: Master the Art of Druidic Power and Sigils


Get ready for an adventure as you step into a magical realm teeming with mysterious forces! Unleash your inner druid and battle your way through this fantasy world, wielding your druidic dragon powers and ancient sigils. With every step, you'll face new challenges. So, brace yourself for a journey filled with thrills, danger, and excitement!

:-: Dragon eggs

Each egg holds the power of a mighty guardian, granting you unparalleled strength, as you venture forth into the treacherous mountains. But beware – the crystal corrupted elementals stand in your way, determined to crush your spirit and break your will. With every victory, you'll feel the thrill of triumph, driving you ever closer to ultimate glory.

:-: Motion spells

With the flick of your wrist or a swift punch, you'll generate a surge of explosive energy, summoning spells that will leave your enemies trembling in fear. And when things get tough, don't hesitate to transform into your mighty dragon form, ready to take on hordes of enemies with razor-sharp claws and fiery breath.

:-: Mana and energy balancing

Your success depends on making the right tactical choices, balancing your mana and energy levels as you unleash devastating attacks with your bow and magic. You'll need to master the art of dodging and weaving your way through enemys. And when the going gets tough, call upon the power of ancient sigils, unleashing a barrage of unstoppable forces to crush your foes. With every decision, you'll feel the adrenaline pumping and driving you towards victory.

:-: Difficulty levels

Prepare yourself for an intense battle as you fight your way through four difficulty levels! With each level, you'll be tested to your limits, pushing yourself to master the abilities of the Dragon Druid. Only the skilled, and most determined will survive to the end – victory awaits those willing to fight for it!
